td.a: Update from our Special Services Department

img.br: Here is some information from the Special Services Department including some instructions on how to access the IEP Parent Portal.

td.a: Chromebook checkout for Middle School students
td.br: If you need a chromebook, you must request one through your homeroom teacher.

img.br: We would like to share some community resources available for our families during this time. Below there is information on daily wellness webinars, community resources for food and assistance and other resources that have been shared with us.

a.p:
Hello Liberty Families,
Welcome to the 2019-20 school year and 25 years of Eagle success! I am excited about the teachers and staff we have at Liberty and am thrilled to be working with a team that truly puts children first...
